meanings.sent1: The road was bumpy and uneven, making the ride uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: She painted the wall, but the finish was uneven and streaky.
meanings.sent3: The cake turned out uneven, looking like a lopsided mountain.
meanings.sent4: His handwriting was so uneven, it seemed like a rollercoaster on paper.
meanings.sent5: The ground was uneven, causing him to stumble and trip frequently.

meanings.definition: Not equal in size, amount, or quality
meanings.sent1: The uneven distribution of candies left some kids with more than others.
meanings.sent2: The twins had uneven heights, with one being noticeably taller than the other.
meanings.sent3: The team's performance was uneven, with some players excelling while others struggled.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork showed an uneven blend of colors, creating a chaotic effect.
meanings.sent5: The uneven portions of the cake made it difficult to share evenly among the guests.

meanings.definition: Not regular or consistent in pattern or distribution
meanings.sent1: The rainfall was uneven, causing flooding in some areas and drought in others.
meanings.sent2: The garden had an uneven growth of plants, with some thriving and others wilting.
meanings.sent3: His sleep schedule was uneven, sometimes staying up late and other times waking up early.
meanings.sent4: The student's grades were uneven, fluctuating between high and low marks.
meanings.sent5: The artist intentionally created an uneven pattern in the design, adding a unique touch to the artwork.
